name: EG Telecom
overview:
EG Telecom operates in over 60 countries where it offers a wide range of payment services through Premium numbers (voice, mobile and Internet). Today it is one of the global references on telecommunications services with added value. Established in Spain in 2008, it has a 2-digit growth recorded each year and its annual revenues reach the â‚¬ 20M. EG Telecom develops innovative and creative solutions for the monetization of digital contents and improves the interactivity and communications between companies and their customers. Among its full range of products, stands Pagantis, the first Spanish platform for the internet micropayment, designed to support all digital business models in the world. Â 

We are a constantly growing team of experts in telecommunications and digital business. We started out in 2008 and since then they have been continuously growing. This is thanks to:

  • The customers who place their trust in us when choosing their provider of added value telecommunications solutions.
  • Our team of experienced professionals, who locate new business opportunities for their customers on a daily basis.
  • The constant development of new and advanced technologies by our Research Department, which enables us to connect with the target in the fastest and most efficient way. -Their distributors and affiliates who, with their platforms, gain the loyalty of the end users.

More info at www.egtelecom.es / www.pagantis.com
